MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL40 postcode area of Dolgellau, affecting properties in Smithfield Lane, Smithfield Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far, we have identified an underground cable fault and starting excavation work on the area. However due to difficult working conditions we now expect your supply to be restored by 10:15am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:43am on 13th December
